html: Thank you to those across the country who continue speak up about #Flint. What happened to my hometown still breaks my heart. Five years later, this water crisis is ongoing. But I know that #Flint is a strong and resilient community with tons of opportunity. #DontForgetFlint
text:
Thank you to those across the country who continue speak up about #Flint. What happened to my hometown still breaks my heart. 

Five years later, this water crisis is ongoing. But I know that #Flint is a strong and resilient community with tons of opportunity. #DontForgetFlint

html: What happened to #Flint is not an anomaly. Rather, what happened to Flint is a warning to other communities across America. We must get serious about improving America’s aging water infrastructure. #FlintWaterCrisis #DontForgetFlint

html: I'm pleased to see the @USAirForce finally come to #Oscoda to discuss #PFAS, but they learned of this chemical contamination at Wurtsmith years ago. #PFAS contamination is a public health crisis. It is long past time for the Air Force to prioritize clean-up at bases.
text:
I'm pleased to see the @USAirForce finally come to #Oscoda to discuss #PFAS, but they learned of this chemical contamination at Wurtsmith years ago. 

#PFAS contamination is a public health crisis. It is long past time for the Air Force to prioritize clean-up at bases.

html: While the #MuellerReport did not draw an ultimate conclusion about whether the President’s conduct was criminal, the report explicitly states that it does not exonerate @realDonaldTrump. The American people now can read the redacted report and draw their own conclusions.
text:
While the #MuellerReport did not draw an ultimate conclusion about whether the President’s conduct was criminal, the report explicitly states that it does not exonerate @realDonaldTrump.

The American people now can read the redacted report and draw their own conclusions.

html: In addition, the #MuellerReport also lays out evidence that @realDonaldTrump attempted to ‘curtail the Special Counsel’s investigation and prevent the disclosure of evidence.’
text: In addition, the #MuellerReport also lays out evidence that @realDonaldTrump attempted to ‘curtail the Special Counsel’s investigation and prevent the disclosure of evidence.’

html: The #MuellerReport outlines, in painstaking detail, evidence that the Russian government interfered ‘in sweeping and systematic fashion’ in the 2016 election.
text: The #MuellerReport outlines, in painstaking detail, evidence that the Russian government interfered ‘in sweeping and systematic fashion’ in the 2016 election.

html: The Attorney General—the nation’s highest-ranking law enforcement official—is supposed to be free from political influence. Yet William Barr’s rush to defend the president by presenting only select facts calls into question his ability to serve as Attorney General.
text: The Attorney General—the nation’s highest-ranking law enforcement official—is supposed to be free from political influence. Yet William Barr’s rush to defend the president by presenting only select facts calls into question his ability to serve as Attorney General.

html: While I continue to read the #MuellerReport, it’s clear that prior to its release, the Attorney General inappropriately cherry-picked select passages to present a more flattering portrayal of @realDonaldTrump, his campaign and administration officials.

The law is clear: (26 U.S.C. 6103(f)) when the House Ways & Means Committee Chairman requests a tax return, the IRS "shall furnish such committee with any return or return information specified in such request"

html: PFAS exposure has been linked to many health issues, including cancer, high cholesterol, weakened immune system & hypertension during pregnancy. But for many veterans exposed to #PFAS, the military has refused to cover these health issues as service-related issues.
text: PFAS exposure has been linked to many health issues, including cancer, high cholesterol, weakened immune system & hypertension during pregnancy. But for many veterans exposed to #PFAS, the military has refused to cover these health issues as service-related issues.

html: The VETS PFAS Act would require the VA to cover treatment of certain health conditions related to #PFAS exposure. Under our bill, PFAS exposure, as a part of military service, would be considered a service-connected disability, making veterans eligible for disability & VA care.
text: The VETS PFAS Act would require the VA to cover treatment of certain health conditions related to #PFAS exposure. Under our bill, PFAS exposure, as a part of military service, would be considered a service-connected disability, making veterans eligible for disability & VA care.

html: When veterans sign up to serve in the military, we make a promise to them that in exchange for their service, we will take care of them & their families when they get home. The bill we are introducing today, the VETS #PFAS Act, helps to make good on that promise.
text:
When veterans sign up to serve in the military, we make a promise to them that in exchange for their service, we will take care of them & their families when they get home. 

The bill we are introducing today, the VETS #PFAS Act, helps to make good on that promise.

The President's declaration is unlawful, as the Constitution clearly gives Congress the power of the purse.

As a co-equal branch of government, Congress will act to defend our constitutional authorities.

html: The Lead and Copper Rule, which failed #Flint families, has not been updated in more than 25 years. It is unacceptable that the Trump Administration continues to delay action to update this regulation, which would reduce lead in drinking water.
text:
The Lead and Copper Rule, which failed #Flint families, has not been updated in more than 25 years. 

It is unacceptable that the Trump Administration continues to delay action to update this regulation, which would reduce lead in drinking water.

html: I also continue to push for Congress to pass my legislation, the NO LEAD Act, which would update the outdated federal Lead and Copper Rule to better protect public health. @SenDuckworth also introduced this legislation in the Senate.https://bit.ly/2L7umRN
text: I also continue to push for Congress to pass my legislation, the NO LEAD Act, which would update the outdated federal Lead and Copper Rule to better protect public health. @SenDuckworth also introduced this legislation in the Senate.https://bit.ly/2L7umRN

html: After the crisis, I pushed Congress to pass the Kildee-Upton law. This bipartisan piece of legislation, signed into law by President Obama, requires the @EPA to immediately notify the public after learning of high levels of lead in drinking water.https://bit.ly/2uJTZNa
text: After the crisis, I pushed Congress to pass the Kildee-Upton law. This bipartisan piece of legislation, signed into law by President Obama, requires the @EPA to immediately notify the public after learning of high levels of lead in drinking water.https://bit.ly/2uJTZNa

html: I called for an @EPAIG investigation into what went wrong during the #FlintWaterCrisis so that we know how to prevent a similar crisis from happening again.
text: I called for an @EPAIG investigation into what went wrong during the #FlintWaterCrisis so that we know how to prevent a similar crisis from happening again.

html: As I have said before, the #FlintWaterCrisis was a failure of government at every level. Justice for Flint families comes in many forms, and the release of the @EPAoig report today is one way to hold those responsible accountable.

html: A federal judge ordered the Trump Administration to reunite children with their families by July 10th (if under 5-years-old) or July 26th (if over the age of 5). @DHSgov & @HHSGov must prioritize the reunification of families to meet these deadlines.
text: A federal judge ordered the Trump Administration to reunite children with their families by July 10th (if under 5-years-old) or July 26th (if over the age of 5). @DHSgov & @HHSGov must prioritize the reunification of families to meet these deadlines.

html: On our tour, @Bethany told me that these children who have been separated from their families are experiencing high levels of trauma. The youngest kid I saw today was just 6 mos. old.
text: On our tour, @Bethany told me that these children who have been separated from their families are experiencing high levels of trauma. The youngest kid I saw today was just 6 mos. old.

html: So far a handful, but clearly not a majority, of the children at @Bethany have been reunited with their families. They are currently working to reunite families with little direction or resources from the Trump Administration. There is little urgency from @HHSgov and @DHSgov.
text: So far a handful, but clearly not a majority, of the children at @Bethany have been reunited with their families. They are currently working to reunite families with little direction or resources from the Trump Administration. There is little urgency from @HHSgov and @DHSgov.

html: With that said, I remain concerned that the Trump Administration—incl. @DHSgov & @HHSGov—does not have a coherent plan to quickly reunite children with their families. Facilities like @Bethany are receiving little or no direction from the federal govt. regarding reunification.
text: With that said, I remain concerned that the Trump Administration—incl. @DHSgov & @HHSGov—does not have a coherent plan to quickly reunite children with their families. Facilities like @Bethany are receiving little or no direction from the federal govt. regarding reunification.

html: I want to thank @Bethany for providing excellent care for children currently in their facilities. While the U.S. shouldn't have had a policy of separating children & families in the first place, the dozens of children we saw are receiving quality care (cont.)
text: I want to thank @Bethany for providing excellent care for children currently in their facilities. While the U.S. shouldn't have had a policy of separating children & families in the first place, the dozens of children we saw are receiving quality care (cont.)

html: Understandably, for the privacy of the children, no photos/videos were allowed on our tour today. I appreciate @Bethany allowing a bipartisan delegation of Members to visit their facilities to see and interact with children who have been separated from their families. (cont).

text:
As a father, it makes me sick to my stomach seeing images of children being separated from their parents and detained in cages.

My full statement on President Trump's inhumane and un-American #FamilySeparation policies: https://bit.ly/2K0w6HW https://twitter.com/CNBC/status/1008727150457950209 …

html: I've received 102 calls and emails so far about President Trump's zero-tolerance child separation policy. 100% of my constituents are against the Trump Administration's cruel #FamilySeparation policies. @RealDonaldTrump: you can end this un-American policy with a phone call.
